roleset.name: Try

example.name: LVC-have
example.text: The plaintiff had first crack at me

example.name: LVC-take
example.text: The few big state farms take first crack at what does get made.

roleset.note: Added due to expansion of Nombank. Comparison to 'attempt' VN class try-61. No Fn class. Framed by Katie.

roleset.name: making a joke

roles.note: I don't think it's really possible to get both "a joke" and the subject matter of the joke in separate args. If you actually see one treed that way though, we should add an arg for the joke.

example.name: just arg1
example.text: Mr. Cathcart says he has had `` a lot of fun '' at Kidder , adding the crack about his being a `` tool - and - die man '' never bothered him
example.arg: about his being a `` tool - and - die man ''

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on more-nouns.

roleset.name: cracking sound

example.name: just arg1
example.text: The pitch sailed toward Bobby Thomson high and inside and then , with a crack of the bat , was sent rocketing back into the lower leftfield stands .

example.name: both args
example.text: his crack of the whip gives pleasure to the audience as well as pain.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on more-nouns, crack-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls sound_emission-43.2.

roleset.name: harsher punishment, suppression

example.name: arg1
example.text: The Egyptian government has carried out a vigorous crack - down on the Islamist group , which says it takes peaceful means to bring about an Islamic government .
example.arg: on the Islamist group , which says it takes peaceful means to bring about an Islamic government

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on more-nouns, crack_down-v.06. No VNcls.
